Alternative Error Code (ALT.ERROR.CD)
The field ALT.ERROR.CD has been created to:
Save duplication of same error messages in the same application
Save duplication of same error messages in different applications
Reduce maintenance of duplicated error messages in one, or more applications. Only the "Alternative" Error record has to be updated. The ALT.ERROR.CD field acts as a link.
On entry of a valid error code, the Description of the Error message is extracted from the Alternative Error Code record and displayed in this fields associated enrichment field.

When linking this Error record to an Alternative Error record, there are only two fields that need to be defined; this field, and the record ID. Whenever this Error record is referenced by T24 the Message, Information, and Solution fields will be extracted from the Alternative Error record.

To prevent a potential hanging situation where one record references an alternative record, and the alternative record references the original record, and so ononly the ID of the original record is reported. The Error message, Error Info, Error Solution fields are not reported.
35 alphanumeric characters in length
Cannot be linked to itself
Must be a valid ID to a record on the EB.ERROR table.

The key to the record that would be used to identify the error message required.
The field is comprised of two parts:
Part 1: The PRODUCT code. Eg: OF for Universal Interface
Part 2: An abbreviated description of the error message.
Eg: For the error message "Mandatory for IB User" that is produced by the OFS.SOURCE application. OFS.SOURCE application appears in the OF Product class. An example key would be: OF.SRC.MAND.IB.USER
